Text: WHERE the fk are the 700MB rips? Who wants to download 1.4GB instead of 700MB? Well, obviously lots of idiots do..... but someone please up a 700MB rip.
Dear AQOS - GMT + xxxlavlxxx thank you for this great movie.  the download was excellent.  I appreciate the smaller size.  God bless you.

@srkaren: 1.39 GB is not "smaller". It's much *larger* than it needs to be. There's virtually no perceptible increase in quality going from 700MB to 1.39GB. I mean, why not make it 8 GB then and get *all* that quality..?
